The pilot said, 'Crisis team ready.' 'Initiate weapon escort program.'
The scene shifts to the coast, where police cars and fire engines have arrived, and the area is cordoned off.

Cui Minho looked at Li Yanming, who nodded in response. He then turned to the colleagues beside him and said, 'The convoy is ready.'
The police said, 'Sorry, the weapon cannot leave.' The bomb disposal truck arrived, and the police officer said, 'Everyone, please step back three feet.'
The man in the suit, Song An, walked out of the office, and the man in the headset, Zhao Zhiren, said, 'Mr. Song, is it?' 'You are making this very difficult.'
The man in the headset replied, 'Yes, difficult.' 'Those Korean experts have already confirmed that item.' 'Why not let them take it?'
Song An said, 'This is not a lost and found issue. It's a matter of national security.'

movie101_6969128872847770149_2400_2580.text: Song An said: "I need your cooperation"
Li Yanming said: "You're asking me to leave my weapons in Hong Kong, how can I cooperate with you?"
Song An, with a serious expression, said: "The Hong Kong government has long been infiltrated by the Chinese." "I'm just a messenger." "You should ask why the Chinese want to control Hong Kong."

Song An: "Mr. Li Yanming, some things, because of your level, I can't share more with you. Why? I've already said, this is within the realm of national security. The Korean experts have confirmed the device and locked it in safe mode, right? I hope you will take a good look, I do not want any more troubles."

The scene shifts to the interior of a tunnel, where a man in a suit said: "This is 300 meters from the intelligence center and 500 meters from the surface" "It's the safest place in Hong Kong to place your country's weapons" "For now, we can only use radio communication"

The two men in black, dressed in chemical suits and wearing gas masks, carefully carried the packed suitcase to the truck. After placing it on the vehicle, they closed the truck door and locked it. The scene shifted to a dimly lit basement, where a man in black was operating a machine.

The scene shifts to the police station, where everyone is in a meeting. Korean Consul said: "What kind of nonsense is this?" "Why can't we directly transport the weapons out?" "Isn't this equivalent to detaining us?"
Korean Consul said: "Our Security Bureau recently" "communicated with your National Intelligence Service officer."
Korean Consul said: "Don't twist the facts." "Our National Intelligence Service never agreed for you to confiscate the weapons."
The police officer replied: "Mr. Korean Consul, we are just following the law"
Korean Consul asked: "Law? What law are you following?"
Li Yanming: "The Central People's Government is responsible for managing" "Hong Kong SAR's foreign affairs" "Hong Kong Basic Law, Article 13"
Song An's eyes were full of anger, but he was powerless. The man in the grey suit said: "This is an international event, it should be handled by international law"
Song An's subordinate said: "Mr. Korean Consul, please don't get agitated, we are also thinking of the bigger picture."
Zhao Zhiren said: "Immediately transporting them out isn't wrong, but based on the Basic Law, we are not wrong either."

movie101_6969128872847770149_2940_3120.text: Song An stood up and said, "I choose to resolve this matter through diplomatic means"

Guniang, with a face full of anger, glared at Shaoxia and said: "I'll tell you this." "I can save you or kill you."
Shaoxia said: "As long as we can escape the desert, I will definitely prove it to you."
The scene shifts to the room where Zhuer is making rice balls. Dazaang walks in and asks, "Haven't slept yet?"
Zhuer asked: "What are you doing?"
Dazaang said: "I am carving a Chishop Excalibur" "I'm sorry" "I forgot you lost your memory."
Zhuer said: 'You haven't given up on Master's last wish to find the sword.'
Dazaang said: "I've never given up, it's just because of you that I haven't gone yet."
Zhuer smiled and said: 'So, how many small wooden swords have you carved?' Dazaang did not answer, only smiled. Zhuer asked again: 'Besides small wooden swords, have you carved anything else?'
Dazaang said: 'I have carved other things.'
Dazaang took out a small wooden sculpture from a nearby box and handed it to Zhuer. Zhuer took the small sculpture and asked, 'Is this me?'
Dazaang said: 'Yes.'
Shaoxia asked: 'But why didn't you carve my facial features?'
Shaoxia replied: 'Because I'm still contemplating whether the face should be the you before losing your memory or the current you.'
Zhuer looked at Dazaang with a smile, but soon, her expression changed. She stared at Dazaang and said: "Dazaang"
Zhuer responded: "Hmm"
Zhuer asked: "Do you like me?"
Zhuer looked at Dazaang and said: "It seems you don't like it."
Dazaang thought for a moment and said, 'I just feel it's very sudden. Why would you ask such a question?'

movie101_7173948149160116773_3300_3480.text: Woman said: "So, is it or is it not?"
Da Zang said: "If I didn't like you, I wouldn't be around you all the time."
Woman asked: "Do you like me before I lost my memory, or after I lost my memory?"
Da Zang looked at the two of them and said: "I like both"
The scene shifts to the desert, where Ben Yue is holding a watermelon, walking towards Fang Baoyu and saying: "You take it, we are already full"
Fang Baoyu, with a face full of dust, turned to look at Ben Yue, and said: "I thought that you would never talk to me again."
Ben Yue said: "Fang Baoyu, I know, you were forced to go to Zhu'er's room in Baiyun Temple."

Ben Yue said: "Wang Dian's plan was seen through by the Holy Mother" "so that night" "when you were practicing" "the Holy Mother hid in the shadows" "used her skills to confuse your mind" "she meant to send you to my room" "but ended up sending you to Zhu'er's room"
Fang Baoyu asked: "How do you know all this?"
Ben Yue said: "The Holy Mother and I are very close," "To ensure my survival," "She told me everything."
The scene shifts to a tea house, where a group of people is sitting together for a tea break. The woman said: "It's too hot, let's go inside and rest."
Waiter said: "Oh, my guests, please come in, hey, sit here." Waiter brought tea for Fang Baoyu and Ben Yue.
Waiter asked, "What would you like to order, my guest?"
Fang Baoyu said: "Anything will do"
Ben Yue said: "Ah, just a moment"
Ben Yue, who was sitting next to him, stood up and walked to the other side of the table. He picked up the wine bowl and said to Fang Baoyu: "Wait, don't drink yet"
Ben Yue, who was sitting beside, noticed something was wrong and asked, "What's wrong?"
Fang Baoyu said: "Look at his boots" "they obviously belong to an imperial official" "We can't stay here for long, let's leave quickly" "You go to Fengbo Pavilion ahead" "I'll follow shortly"
Ben Yue said: "Okay, be careful."
The scene shifts to a kitchen, where a man is stirring a pot. Waiter comes in with a tray and announces, "My guest, your bun is here"

movie101_7173948149160116773_3480_3660.text: The scene shifts to a warehouse, where a group of people in armor are dancing, and the man in the center is spinning a long whip.

The man in black was not outdone, his movements were fierce and swift, and he was not afraid to roll on the ground to avoid danger. The man in black took advantage of a moment of respite to grab a wooden stake and thrust it into the ceiling.
The man in the gray suit was not outdone, his leg kicked the opponent's chest, then he grabbed her arm and threw her out of the inn.

The scene shifts to the forest where Mulang Shenjun is, with water droplets falling from the leaves. Mulang Shenjun looks at the person in front of him and says: "Even if you kill them all, you still won't stand a chance."
The scene shifts to a military camp where soldiers are lined up. The leader says: "You should recognize these weapons, shouldn't you?"
The scene shifts to the execution ground, where Mulang Shenjun holds a knife to his neck and says, "Drop the knife."
The blade was sharp and swift, cutting through the air like a silver dragon, and in the next second, it pierced through the wooden floor.
The guards urgently said: "Go, go, hurry up, move faster, get inside."
The woman struggled and said: "Let go of me."
The scene shifts to the county prince's mansion, where a soldier reports: "Supervisor, the person has been brought here."
The leader said: "You may leave now."
The guards said: "Yes."

The scene shifts to the courtyard, where Mulang Shenjun is standing in the middle, and the other three are standing in a row in front of him. The two maids are holding the hands of the two youngest girls, Ben Yue and the little demon, and the two youngest girls are looking at Mulang Shenjun with resentment.
The scene shifts, and Mulang Shenjun, now a general, returns to the palace. He walks into the main hall, where a woman is standing. She turns around, and it is his childhood sweetheart, Ben Yue.

Duchess Tuo Chen, with a face full of grievance, was about to speak when Mulang Shenjun grabbed her wrist. She stared at Mulang Shenjun's hand on her wrist, then at his face, and finally, with a flick of her sleeve, she broke free from his grasp.

The scene shifts, and the two are now in a dimly lit room. Mulang Shenjun is helping Duchess Tuo Chen remove the hairpin from her hair. As he gently pulls it out, a lock of her hair falls down, and she suddenly looks different.

Duchess Tuo Chen, with tears in her eyes, looked at Mulang Shenjun in front of her, her expression one of disbelief. She reached out to touch Mulang Shenjun's face, then said: "Tuocheng, I never imagined I would meet you here."
Duchess Tuo Chen, with tears streaming down her face, tried to push Mulang Shenjun away, saying: "Don't touch me, who the hell are you?"
The scene shifts to the interior of the house, where the woman is seen sitting on a wooden stool, her face full of worry. She occasionally looks outside, her expression growing more anxious.

The scene shifts to the room, where Ben Yue is sitting by the bed, staring blankly at the ground. Suddenly, a drop of water falls from the sky, landing perfectly on a butterfly. Ben Yue looks up, her eyes filled with confusion.

movie101_7173948149160116773_3660_3840.text: Fang Baoyu said, "At dawn, they will kill us"
Ben Yue asked, "Baoyu, are you afraid?"

Fang Baoyu said: "Facing death, who isn't afraid?" "However, what I feel more is unwillingness," "I feel I've let many people down." "First of all, I failed my grandfather since I couldn't avenge him."
Fang Baoyu said: "And I also failed the Purple-Robed Marquis" "betrayed his expectations of me" "the person I wronged the most is you" "I promised them" "I promised them everything"
Ben Yue said: "No, I can't let you do something foolish, you can't become a lackey of the court, you can't work for the Wood Wolf God."
The old man walked in and said, "You are my grandson."
The scene shifts to a forest where Zhu Er and Huyan Dazang are walking side by side. Shitai is following behind them with a gloomy expression.
Shitai said: "Alright, this is where we part ways, I wish you both much fortune and long life."
Shitai said: "Shitai." Shitai turned around, and Zhu Er was right behind her.
Huyan Dazang, who was not far away, saw this scene and immediately drew his sword and rushed forward.
Zhu Er shouted: "Shitai!"
Huyan Dazang, who was about to draw his sword, was stopped by Zhu Er. Wang Dian shouted: "Stop, take one more step and I'll kill her in front of you all."
Huyan Dazang asked: "Shitai, are you alright?"
Shitai said: "No, no."
Huyan Dazang said: "Wang Dian, what do you want?"
Shitai, terrified, was held at knife-point by Wang Dian, who said: "Kill him and I'll release this old nun."
Huyan Dazang said: "Zhu Er has lost her memory" "The poison has been neutralized" "She won't listen to you anymore"
Wang Dian said: "Zhu Er, have you really lost your memory? You don't remember me?"
Wang Dian laughed and said, "You can't fool me." "Quick, kill that Huyan Dazang now."
Shitai, with tears in her eyes, said: "Wang Dian, remember what I just said."

movie101_7173948149160116773_3840_4020.text: Shitai said, "Remember what I just said."

The scene shifts to the woods, where Wang Dian and Dazaang are still fighting. Dazaang is now holding a long knife, which he uses to press towards Wang Dian. Wang Dian, in a flash of brilliance, catches the knife with his left hand and strikes Dazaang's neck with his right, knocking him unconscious.
The scene shifts to the woods, where Shitai is lying on the ground, and Dazaang is pressing him down. Shitai says, 'Do you know you have killed a kind monk?'
The two of them fought from the woods to the lawns, and finally, Dazaang kicked Wang Dian to the ground. Dazaang said, 'Wang Dian, you are going to die.'
Shitai said, "Not so easy," and then the two engaged in close combat.
The two were still fighting in the woods, while the pursuers had already reached the clearing.
Dazaang, with a flick of his wrist, drew his sword and shouted, "If the heaven doesn’t take you, I will!"
Shitai: "Zhu Er" "Zhu Er" "Please beg him to save dad please" "Please beg him, Zhu Er"

Zhu Er said: "I remember you are my dad, I also remember how you killed grandma with a sword. Now you don't even spare Shitai, you are not human at all, you do not deserve to live. Your life, your life, will only bring more harm to others."
Wang Dian said, 'Zhu Er, please beg him for mercy for the sake of our father-daughter relationship.'
Zhu Er said, "You killed grandma with your own hands, what family are you talking about?"
Zhu Er, clutching her chest, fell to the ground. Shitai cried out, "Zhu Er!"
The scene shifts to Mulang Shenjun pouring water into a cup.
Bai Sankong said, 'I told you, if anything happens to Baoyu, I won't let you go. Your men are all mediocrity. It would be easy for me to kill you.'
The scene shifts to Mulang Shenjun, who says, 'Bai Sankong, you've always been dedicated in your work for the court. Is it worth it to ruin your future for a mere Fang Baoyu?'
The scene shifts, and Wang Dian says, "Baoyu is my only family, even though I have wealth and influence, and hold a high official position."

movie101_7173948149160116773_4020_4200.text: Bai Sankong said: "Even if I have wealth and power, what use is it without him? If you don't agree with me, we can part ways, and you'll be the one to regret it."

The scene shifts to the interior of the mansion, where a servant reports to Bai Sankong: 'Report, sir,' 'Fang Baoyu, he says he wants to see you.' Bai Sankong nods in response. Zhu Er is seen sitting at the table, writing something in a book.
Zhu Er, who was sitting on the side, saw this scene and stood up, saying, "Do you blame me for regaining my memory long ago but never telling you?"
Huyan Dazang looked at Zhu Er and said, "I knew it a long time ago; I just didn't say it."
Zhu Er asked, 'You knew?'
Huyan Dazang said: "That night in the grass hut, your words and actions already gave it away."
Zhu Er asked, 'Then why didn't you expose me?'

Huyan Dazang said: "Because during this period, these have been the happiest days since we fell in love. I stayed away from the tumultuous life of the martial world and led a carefree life of planting and tending crops. I didn't want to ruin this harmony."
Zhu Er said: "I also cherish everything here." "But it's all over now."
Huyan Dazang said, "I've made up my mind." "I want to find the Nine Treasured Swords as soon as possible to fulfill my master's wish and leave the martial world."
Zhu Er said: "But finding all nine treasured swords is bound to be extremely difficult."
Huyan Dazang said, 'I know. Recently, I've heard of a place in southern Sichuan called Jiange that has the remaining six swords. I wonder if you would come with me.'
Zhu Er said: 'From now on, no matter where you go, I will never leave you. Even if it's a dragon's den or a tiger's lair, I will accompany you through it.'

Huyan Dazang, with a face full of worry, sat down in front of the table, and Fang Baoyu, with hands behind his back, walked up to Mulang Shenjun and said, 'I came to see you to ask you to release Ben Yue.'

The scene shifts to Mulang Shenjun sitting opposite Fang Baoyu, saying, 'Alright, I assume your grandfather already told you that if you want to see Ben Yue, you must bring the heads of Ziyi Hou and Baishui Shengmu in exchange.'
Fang Baoyu said, 'Don't even think about it.'
Huyan Dazang said, 'Do you have any other choice?'
The woman looked at the man in front of her, her eyes filled with surprise. She said, 'Isn't that Eight-Armed Divine Ape Li Ziyuan? Why is he here?'
Huyan Dazang, hiding in the shadows, said, 'I'll take advantage of the chaos to capture him and ask.'
The scene switches to the prison, where the leader of the Imperial Guards, Ba Bi Shen Yuan Li Ziyuan, is interrogating a prisoner: "Tell me, where is Wang Dian? Don't try any tricks."

movie101_7173948149160116773_4200_4380.text: The man said: "I really don't know. I was ordered to wait for him in South Chuan for a month, but he never showed up."
Fang Baoyu asked: "Whose orders?"
The subordinate said: "Of course, it was the order of the chief."
Fang Baoyu asked: "What is the relationship between Wang Dian and the Forbidden Guards?"
The man shook his head and said, 'I really don't know that.'
The old man shouted: 'Baoyu'
Zhuer turned around and saw the visitor was Mulang Shenjun, who said, "Zhuer."
Huyan Dazang, with a wave of his hand, signaled the maid to leave, then picked up the wine pot and poured wine for Fang Baoyu, saying: "Why did you bring wine?"

Huyan Dazang said: "Since I came to the Central Plains, I have been solely focused on seeking the sword, and often thought we would have a fight. I didn't expect to be fighting alongside you today, it’s delightful. Cheers."

The scene shifts to the courtyard of the Prince's Mansion. The three of them, Fang Baoyu, Huyan Dazang, and Zhu Er, are sitting in the hall, while Mulang Shenjun is standing by the tree, listening to the conversation of the three. Zhu Er says: "Fang Baoyu, you must not be too sad."
The letter read: "At dawn tomorrow, at the fortress gate, Ben Yue's blood will be spilled on the yellow sand."
The scene shifts to a military camp where soldiers are lined up in formation. In the center, a woman dressed in plain clothes is hung on a wooden stake, with a large knife placed on her chest.

The scene shifts to the training ground, where the two are locked in a stalemate. The soldiers with long spears surround them, but none dares to advance. The two inside the wooden cage are also at a standstill, neither giving in. Suddenly, Ben Yue, with a slight smile, takes a sip of wine from the goblet in her hand. Seeing this, Mulang Shenjun also takes a sip from his goblet.
Huyan Dazang said: "Baoyu, don't come over!" "Don't come over, Baoyu!"
The scene shifts to Mulang Shenjun, who says: "You are really loyal, coming here together to die."
Fang Baoyu: 'I’m asking you one last time, will you release the person or not?'
The scene shifts to the palace, where Mulang Shenjun sits on the throne, staring at the kneeling Bai Sankong. Mulang Shenjun says: 'What do you think?'
The two were as different as chalk and water, one swift and powerful, the other agile and graceful. The fight was intense and even, with no clear winner for a long time.
The soldiers on the field were no match for him, all falling one by one to the ground.

The soldiers on the field were no match for Huyan Dazang, falling one after another. The only Bai Sankong was left, swinging his iron staff at Huyan Dazang. Huyan Dazang dodged the attack, causing the staff to hit the ground. Seeing this, Huyan Dazang kicked Bai Sankong away.
The two were evenly matched in their fight, with the soldiers behind them unable to keep up. They quickly retreated to avoid the flying dust.

The two were evenly matched in skill, with the clang of weapons echoing throughout the training ground. The soldiers on the field were fully focused, their expressions serious, their eyes fixed solely on the sparring warriors. The two men tested each other, probing for weaknesses, with the short blade in Bai Sankong's hand wielded like thunder, striking with the force of a whirlwind.

The two were evenly matched in their fight, with the soldiers around them constantly falling to the ground. The two fighters' movements were like the dance of the moon and the stars, with the sound of bells adding to the majesty of the scene.

movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.text: Li Xiaoran said: "It's not a duel, it's a beating."

The soldiers outside the door were still searching. The three of them hid in the corner, and the soldiers happened to pass by them. The three of them lay on the ground, not daring to move. The soldiers left after confirming there was no one.
Zhu Er asked, "Why did you kill him?"
Huyan Dacang asked, '"Didn't you want to kill him just now?"
Zhu Er said: 'I didn't mean for you to kill him! That's not what I meant! How am I supposed to explain this to others? Oh, where are you going?'
Huyan Dacang said: "I have other things to do." "I helped you kill him." "You helped bandage my wound." "We owe each other nothing."
Zhu Er said: "What do you mean, owe each other nothing?" "Everyone saw you kill him for me." "What am I supposed to do? What should I do?"
Huyan Dacang said: "He deserved to die."

Servant said: "Hey, I'm going to follow you." "You have to help me explain." "You killed the person." "It has nothing to do with me." "Otherwise, people will think I'm your accomplice." "I couldn't clear my name even if I jumped into the Yellow River."

Servant read the letter and said: "My Lord, upon reading this letter, I fear my days are numbered. I have no other attachments in this life. I only leave my daughter Bai Yanzhu's son. I earnestly request that the Lord take him in and pass on martial arts to him."
Servant clasped his hands and said: "I hope the Lord will grant this wish."
Purple Marquis said: "Your grandfather wants me to take you as a disciple."
Servant said: "Hurry and bow to your master."
Zhu Er said: "The sea breeze is strong here, we must be near the sea."
Zhu Er asked: "What are you planning to do?"
Huyan Dacang looked at the letter and said, "You should leave."
Zhu Er said: "How many times do I have to tell you, you killed Li Xiaoran, I have no way to survive if I go back."
Huyan Dacang said: 'I'm going to a duel this time. My life is uncertain. Thank you for taking care of me these past few days. Please, go back.'
Zhu Er said, "If you keep fighting like this, one day you'll die."
Huyan Dacang said: "To die for the way of the sword, I have no regrets."
Zhu Er asked: "What about your family?"
Huyan Dacang replied: "I have no family."
Zhu Er said, "Surely you have friends who are worried about you."
Huyan Dacang looked at Zhu Er and said: "Friend?" "Speaking of friends, you're the only one."
Zhu Er said: "I won't let you leave."
Huyan Dacang said: "If you keep talking, I will kill you too."
Zhu Er, shocked, said: "You would even kill friends."
Servant said: "My Lord, I presume you are already aware of my request."
Purple Marquis said: 'I'm sorry, Brother Wang, I no longer concern myself with the matters of the martial world.'

Brother Wang said: "But this concerns the honor and disgrace of the martial arts world in the Central Plains." "The one renowned as the best swordfighter, Purple Marquis," "isn't willing to fight for the justice of the martial world?"
Purple Marquis said: "Brother Wang, to be honest, I really don't enjoy the days filled with fighting and killing, moreover, what if I were the best in the world at martial arts."
Servant said: 'I would like to show the Marquis something, please.'
Servant: "Please, Marquis, come out of retirement."

movie101_7173948149160116773_4380_4560.text: The two of them fought fiercely, each unwilling to give in. The soldiers on the field were no match for them, as they fought with each other.
The two men in red robes, with long spears in hand, charged at Fang Baoyu. Fang Baoyu dodged the long spears and then kicked one of the men in red robes onto the high platform.

The two were evenly matched in their fight, with no clear winner for a long time. The soldiers around them were no match, all falling to the ground in pain. The two fighters' skills were extraordinary, with moves like thunder striking, lightning fast, and their techniques were as precise as the Tai Chi symbol under their feet.

The scene shifts, and the next day, Mu Lang is dressed in luxurious official robes, adorned with various jade and gold accessories, wearing a crown, and sitting in the main seat of the painted boat, flanked by numerous palace maids.

The scene shifts to the city wall, where Mu Lang is holding a sword to Ben Yue's neck, and the two are standing on a tall wooden stake. Mu Lang's subordinates are holding spears at the base of the stake, and the princess is tied to the stake with ropes.
The two of them fought fiercely, evenly matched. The soldiers on the shore were no match for them, all watching the two fight from a distance.
The soldiers on the field were no match for the invincible Huyan Dazang, and they were all driven back.

The soldiers on the field were still fighting fiercely. The soldiers with long spears kept thrusting at the approaching ones. The soldiers with shields protected their companions behind them. The soldiers with swords slashed at the enemy, and those skilled in martial arts used both hands and feet, displaying impressive martial arts.
The soldiers on the field were no match for the long-haired man, their cries echoing as they fell one by one.
The soldiers on the field were no match for Bai Sankong, falling one after another. The long sword in Bai Sankong's hand was like a rainbow, turning the battlefield into a bloody scene.

The scene shifts to the street, where the common people are watching the commotion. A person in green robes, Purple Marquis, is performing a magic trick, summoning wind and rain with a wave of their hands.
Purple Marquis quickly ran to Yan Zhu's side, anxiously asking, "Yan Zhu, Yan Zhu, are you alright?"
The scene shifts to the Prince's Mansion, where Mu Lang is still practicing martial arts with his sword. He is now skilled in the art of swordsmanship, and his movements are powerful and swift.
The soldiers, upon seeing this, drew their swords and surrounded the two, shouting, "Quick, kill them."
The two quickly arrived at the gate, and Huyan Dazang said, "Go."
The scene shifts to the outskirts of the village, where a group of soldiers in armor are holding bows and arrows, surrounding the entire village. Seeing this, the soldiers shouted, "Stop!"

The scene shifts to the outskirts of Luoyang city, where a group of soldiers in armor and a foreign woman are waiting for the arrival of the Yulin Guard. The foreign woman is none other than the infamous Peach Blossom, who is now looking around with a cold gaze.
The scene shifts to the backyard where Yan Zhu is lying on the ground, and Purple Marquis hurriedly runs over to check on her, shouting, "Yan Zhu!"

movie101_7173948149160116773_4560_4740.text: Purple Marquis: "Yan Zhu."
Yan Zhu said: "Purple Marquis, am I about to die?" "I really didn't expect my father to still be alive."
Purple Marquis said: "You will be fine" "Trust me, you will be fine."

The scene shifts to the attic, where Yan Zhu is lying in Purple Marquis's arms, sleeping soundly. Bai Sankong, upon seeing this, quietly steps back, then suddenly exclaims, "Yan Zhu, is it really you?"
The man in black drew his sword and said, "Do not come any closer."
Bai Sankong said, "She is really my daughter."
Purple Marquis said, "What are you doing here?" "So the Swordsman of Qingping is indeed not dead." "What do you want?"
Bai Sankong said, "I am here to find my daughter. I want to talk to her alone."
Bai Sankong said, "Purple Marquis, please step out for a moment." Bai Sankong walked over to Yan Zhu, who was lying on the ground, and helped her up.

Bai Sankong: "Yan Zhu, why?" "Why would you rather hide your identity" "and live as the Great Demon Whitewater Saintess of the martial world," "than reunite with your family?" "Than acknowledge me?" "Does it mean you can even abandon your son?" "Why is that?"

Yan Zhu said: "Why?" "Don't you know why?" "When I was at my wit's end, Whitewater Saintess saved me." "I know she is denounced by everyone as a demoness." "But she treated me as her own child. And you?" "You used despicable means" "to separate me from Huo Feiteng, the love of my life, and let him die tragically outside the pass." "Was what you did meaningful? Was it meaningful?"
Bai Sankong, with a bitter face, said, "If you still recognize me as your father, then you should recognize Fang Baoyu too."

Yan Zhu, who was lying on the ground, suddenly sat up, staring intently at the person in front of her. Fang Baoyu, with a face full of worry, took a few steps forward, only to be pushed away by Yan Zhu. "What did you say?" "You are my mother?"
Yan Zhu said: "I, Fang, Fang Baoyu."
Fang Baoyu asked, "Purple Marquis, is this true?"

Purple Marquis said: "Yes, she is your mother. I wanted to tell you earlier, but there was never a good opportunity. Now that the enemies are at the gates, if I don't tell you now, there may never be another chance. This is also your grandfather's wish."
Fang Baoyu, in disbelief, said: "No, it can't be. It absolutely can't be."
Yan Zhu chased after Fang Baoyu, calling out, "Fang Baoyu, no, Fang Baoyu."
Purple Marquis said, "Calm down."
Da Zang said, "Now that your family is reunited, I congratulate you all."

movie101_7173948149160116773_4740_4920.text: Purple Marquis said, "Da Zang, this matter also concerns you. Please don't leave yet."
Purple Marquis said, "I am from Penglai, this family matter has nothing to do with me."
Yan Zhu said: "That swordsman Huo Feiteng died under your master's sword."
Da Zang asked: 'What evidence do you have?'

Yan Zhu said, 'Have you forgotten I once inquired about your background? You even told me. You said your master is Gongsun Liang of the Northern Penglai Celestial Sect. Your father and your master both prized their swords. Your father entrusted you to your master on his deathbed, correct?'
Yan Zhu said, 'Yes, my master told me everything. He said he met my father in the Central Plains.'
Yan Zhu said: "You said the jade pendant you carry" "is the only thing your father left you, right?"

Yan Zhu said, "The jade pendant is Huo Feiteng's family heirloom." "You've always treated it as a talisman." "Back in the day, he gave it to me as a token of affection," "I gave it to you on the day you turned one month old." "The eagle tattoo on your back is exactly the same as Feiteng’s." "I don't know how your master took you to Penglai," "but I know you are the child of Feiteng and me." "You are my child."
Da Zang said, "So according to you, my master is my father's killer, Baoyu is my brother, and you are my mother. Impossible, I won't believe it."

The scene shifts to the inner room, where Yan Zhu, with tears in her eyes, rushes into the room, throws herself into Purple Marquis's arms, and weeps bitterly. Purple Marquis gently pats her back, offering comfort.
Yan Zhu, with tears in her eyes, looked at the lute and gently stroked it. Her fingers were like jade, graceful and elegant, moving lightly and delicately across the strings.
The scene shifts to Bai Sankong, who is sitting in the pavilion playing the zither.
The scene shifts to Mulang Shenjun sitting in front of Bai Sankong, saying, "Bai Sankong, you're in quite high spirits today."

The scene shifts to the next day, Bai Sankong sits in the pavilion waiting for Yan Zhu, when Yan Zhu finally arrives, she approaches Bai Sankong and says, 'May I have the honor of hearing you play a piece today?'
Bai Sankong continued, 'The ancients played the zither for their own amusement, not for others. I’m just playing by myself today. However, I know you appreciate good music, sir.'

movie101_7173948149160116773_4920_5100.text: Supervisor said: "I'm just here for the fun."
Bai Sankong said: "However, since the Supervisor has said so," "if I don't give face, it would be too disrespectful."

The blanket was not warm enough, and he unconsciously pulled it up. The kerosene lamp in the room was still lit, casting a dim yellow light. The room was silent, with only the sound of Che Zhenshan's breathing and the kerosene lamp flickering.
Lin Lin said, "You're awake?"
Che Zhenshan asked, "Where am I?"
Che Zhenshan said, "Medical room."
Che Zhenshan said, "I'm still alive."
Lin Lin said, "The doctor said the bullet almost hit your heart." "For me, Mo Han, I had misjudged you before."

movie101_7176565114756137528_1500_1680.text: Lin Lin said, "I was wrong before, I'm sorry."
Mo Han said, "The one who should be sorry is me." "I didn't know your mother." "And your boyfriend were all... by the Japanese." "I'm sorry."
Lin Lin anxiously shouted, "Mo Han, Mo Han, Doctor, Doctor."
Che Zhen Shan said, "If something happens to Secretary Yang, I'll have your life."
Lu Xiao said, 'Yes, my life was the one group leader saved, from a pile of dead bodies. The group leader can take it without a word, just for this one, an unclaimed, useless secretary.'
Che Zhen Shan said, "Impertinence! Get out of here."
Lu Xiao shouted, "Group leader!"
Che Zhen Shan said, "Get out."
Che Zhen Shan said, "Come back." "Lu Xiao should think longer before acting." "You've followed me for so many years." "Ah, how can you still act so recklessly, like a headless fly."
Che Zhen Shan sat in the office, Lu Xiao stood in front of him, Che Zhen Shan said, "There's something I can't figure out." "Tell me who dares to cross me, Che Zhen Shan, on this turf of Liu City?"
Lu Xiao said, "You suspect the identity of the kidnappers."
Che Zhen Shan said, "Although I haven't met all the local bandit leaders, I've heard of them. But the way this group acted today was strange."
Che Zhen Shan slammed the phone down and asked, "Where do you think they came from?"
Lu Xiao said, "The bandits in the Northeast are causing trouble." "Could they come from there."
Che Zhen Shan said, "Seal the city immediately and inspect it thoroughly."
Lu Xiao said, "Yes, I'll go right away."
Che Zhen Shan turned around and said, "Wait, you accompany me to visit Secretary Yang first."
Che Zhen Shan said, "Look at him."
Che Zhen Shan said, "You're still my deputy."

Lin Lin held a bowl of porridge in one hand and a spoon in the other, slowly bringing the porridge to Mo Han's mouth. Mo Han, who had been awake for a while, finally showed a slight smile. He opened his mouth, but the porridge trickled down his chin. Lin Lin quickly wiped his chin with a towel.
Mo Han said, 'Yu Xuan, I'm leaving. Can you let me kiss you once? Just once.'
Yu Xuan smiled and said, 'Wait until after the revolution is victorious.'
Mo Han looked at Yu Xuan, then turned and walked towards the door. Mo Han said, 'Then I'm leaving. Take care.'
Yu Xuan, who was about to go downstairs, heard the sound of a child crying and hurriedly went to check. She opened the door and saw a little boy crying on the steps.
Yu Xuan, who was standing nearby, saw this scene and was deeply moved. She walked up to Mo Han, gently hugged him, and then started wiping his cheeks with a handkerchief.
Lin Lin asked, "Does it hurt?"
Lin Lin wiped the sweat from Mo Han's forehead with a towel. Mo Han was still unconscious. Lin Lin said, 'Mo Han, for me, you almost lost your life.'
Mo Han said, "It's not over."

movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.text: Mo Han said, 'I'm not dead yet, don't be sad. Even if I die, it's deserved.'
Lin Lin cried and said, 'I can never repay you for your kindness in this lifetime.'
Mo Han said, "Don't mention that. Do you remember 'The Peony Pavilion'? The living can die, the dead can live. Maybe everything is destined."
Lin Lin, holding the bowl, looked at the unconscious Mo Han, then glanced at Lu Xiao. Lu Xiao walked over, took the bowl, and said, 'Lin Lin, let me do it.'
Lin Lin said, 'Secretary Yang, the commander-in-chief is here to see you.'
Lu Xiao walked over and said, 'Lin Lin, let me do it. Look how tired you've become these past few days.'
Lin Lin said, 'I want to give everything to the person who has given their life for me.'
Mo Han said, "That's too complicated for me to understand. All I know is, as a man, I can't always let a girl accompany me.""Isn't that right, Secretary Yang?"
Lin Lin said, 'What nonsense are you talking about? Who let you in?'
Lin Lin said, 'I will move him to my room tomorrow and accompany him every day.'
Lu Xiao said, "Lin Lin, don't joke around."
Che Zhen Shan said, "I mean what I say."
Che Zhen Shan said, "Lu Xiao, you should go and take care of that matter." "Hurry up."
Che Zhen Shan, seeing Lin Lin so angry, quickly stepped forward to mediate, 'Secretary Yang, that's just the way Lu Xiao is. Don't take it to heart.'
Che Zhen Shan said, 'Lin Lin, let me do it.'
Che Zhen Shan said, 'No need.'
Che Zhen Shan asked, 'Secretary Yang, are you feeling better?'
Mo Han said, 'Commander, I'm sorry for causing you trouble.'
Che Zhen Shan said, 'Don't think too much, just focus on healing.'
Che Zhen Shan, who was about to leave, was startled by the news and said, 'What? The bandit escaped?'
Che Zhen Shan said, "The checkpoint at Dongda bridge says""They escaped by boat last night.""They even kidnapped a hostage as a cover."
Che Zhen Shan said, 'Such elusive behavior, it's not a common bandit. Could it be the Communist Party?'

Che Zhen Shan: "But why would the Communist Party kidnap my daughter?"Not killing her or doing anything cruel and unusual,""just for a hundred taels of gold? Is that possible?""If they're not after gold, then what are they after?"
Che Zhen Shan said, 'They also kidnapped a businessman's daughter not too long ago.'
Che Zhen Shan said, 'Oh, it seems like they are really bandits after all.'

movie101_7176565114756137528_1860_2040.text: Lin Lin walked to the desk, put down the medical kit, and started to look through the materials on the desk. Suddenly, she heard a noise behind her.
Mo Han said, "This music is so nice." "Lin Lin, I think I should go back." "Living here is not very convenient." "You need to work and take care of me."

Mo Han said, "Don't get your wires crossed. I'll be fine right away." Mo Han lay on the bed, hands crossed over his chest, eyes closed, trying to sleep. He turned over and opened his eyes, only to see Lin Lin packing his luggage.
Mo Han said, 'Lin Lin, I need to go to the bathroom. Can you help me up?'
Lin Lin said, 'Okay.' Lin Lin hurriedly ran to the bedside, helped Mo Han lie down, and pulled the blanket up.
Lin Lin, with her head down, said nothing. Mo Han stood up, walked to the bed, and sat down.
Lin Lin helped Mo Han sit on the bed, then turned and walked towards the desk. Mo Han took off his coat and threw it on the chair, then lay down on the bed.
Lin Lin said, 'Be careful, you go back to bed, I'll call the guard to bring the urinal in.'
Mo Han said, 'Ah, no need, I just didn't walk too well. It's okay now.'
The two of them were in a hurry, not noticing the soldier standing at the door. They walked straight past the soldier, who was startled by their actions.
Lin Lin said, 'It's here.'
The scene shifts, and Mo Han says, 'Miss Lin Lin, I brought some porridge for Secretary Yang.'
Lin Lin said, "I'll take care of it."
Soldier hurriedly said, 'Let me, let me, it's hot, I'll do it.'
Lin Lin said, 'Hey, don't put it there. How could you be so clumsy? Get out quickly.'
Soldier said, 'Yes, yes.'
Lin Lin took the money and left, leaving Mo Han standing there, bewildered.
The scene shifts to the military camp, where Lu Xiao is bidding farewell to a soldier. The soldier, carrying his luggage, said, 'Lu Xiao, I'm leaving.'
Lu Xiao picked up the phone and said, "Where did he say he was going?"
Soldier: 'Said he was going to buy a gift for Miss Lin Lin.'
Lu Xiao walked to the table, picked up the phone, and said, "Follow that man with the surname Yang immediately."
Lu Xiao: 'Do you remember the book I asked you to buy last time?' 'Yes, I'm fine now.' 'Room 305 at the Fokai Hotel, tonight at seven.' 'Don't worry, I'll be on time.'

The scene shifts to Lu Xiao, who is eavesdropping on the conversation between Lin Lin and Mo Han. He is sitting in a room, with a phone receiver to his ear, listening intently. Suddenly, he stands up, puts down the receiver, and strides out of the room.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2040_2220.text: The scene shifts to the next day, with the sun rising over the prairie and the wildflowers swaying gently in the breeze.
Lin Lin said, "Thank you for taking care of me these days."
Lin Lin said, "The sun sets, but it will rise as usual tomorrow, you say. Once this pendant shatters, will it ever be the same?"
Mo Han asked, 'Why does it have to shatter?'
Lin Lin said, "In times of chaos, who can guarantee that a tiny pendant won't be destroyed?"
Mo Han said, "Then it should be well protected."

Lin Lin said, "Could you help me put it on?" Mo Han smiled and put the necklace on Lin Lin. Then, Mo Han hugged Lin Lin from behind, and they leaned on each other, enjoying the beautiful scenery around them.
Mo Han said, "For a long time, I felt like the most unfortunate person in the world, always unable to move on from the past, afraid to love again for fear of falling back into a life's abyss."
Mo Han said, "Let the past be the past."
Mo Han said, "You only live once, cherish it."
Lin Lin said, 'Thank you for giving me the courage to love again, thank you.'
Lin Lin said, 'You gave me a gift, can I take you out for a meal?'
Lin Lin said, "Today, huh"
Mo Han said, "Yes, let's go to the Four Joys Restaurant now, to make up for my past mistakes."
Mo Han: "I can't today, I have an appointment." "Let's change it to another day." "I'll invite you."
Lin Lin said, 'Hmm, who's more important than me?'
Mo Han said, "An old friend, we've grown up together."
Lin Lin asked, "Is it your childhood sweetheart?"
Mo Han asked, "What are you thinking?"
Mo Han sat on the ground, watching Lin Lin's departing figure. He didn't know what to do. He wanted to follow her, but he couldn't leave. He sat there, not knowing what to do.
The scene shifts, and Mo Han arrives at the entrance of Lu Xiao's residence. He stealthily peeks through the window, observing the situation inside the house.
Lu Xiao, who had been waiting outside for a long time, saw the two leave and quickly followed them.
The scene shifts to the street in front of the paper shop, where Lu Xiao is pacing back and forth with large strides, looking around cautiously, his eyes filled with anxiety.
The scene shifts, and Mo Han is seen lying on the ground, with Lu Xiao standing guard nearby.
The scene shifts, and Mo Han is seen sitting in a chair, leaning forward with his hands on his thighs, looking at the floor. The room was very dark, with only a faint light shining on his face.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.text: Lu Xiao, who had been knocked down by Mo Han, regained consciousness. He saw Mo Han approaching and quickly pulled out his gun, aiming at him.
Mo Han said, "Why is it you, Lu Xiao"
Lu Xiao stopped him and asked, 'Secretary Yang, where are you going in such a hurry?'
Mo Han replied, "I'm just strolling around."
Lu Xiao said, 'Do you think I don't know you're heading to room 305 at Fuhkai Hotel?'
Mo Han looked at him with a smile and said, 'Lu Xiao, you seem well informed.'
Lu Xiao said, 'Speak up, who are you meeting?'
Mo Han said, 'Do I need to tell you?'
Lu Xiao pointed the gun at Mo Han and said, 'Don't play dumb with me. Are you meeting with the Japanese or the Communists? Speak up.'
Mo Han said, 'Lu Xiao, I tell you, I am Yang Mohan who serves the Nanjing Government.'
Lu Xiao said, 'A servant of Nanjing Government? Keep dreaming that in your next life. You don’t need to tell me. We'll go back to the regiment and see.'
Mo Han said, "Lu Xiao, why bother? I can tell you, but you can't let Miss Che know."
Lu Xiao said, 'What, Miss Che?'
Mo Han said, "Actually, I'm going to meet my fiancee."
Lu Xiao said, 'Why didn't you say that earlier? Having a fiancee is a great thing, a great thing indeed. Go ahead, go ahead!'
Mo Han said, "Then I'm leaving."
Lu Xiao said, "Go ahead, go ahead." Mo Han left with a smile, and Lu Xiao watched him leave, then turned to walk back to the paper shop.
The scene shifts to Mo Han, who is walking down the hallway. He arrives at the front of a room, knocks on the door, and says, 'Room service number 21 is here to deliver your newspaper.'
Yu Xuan said, "Come in."
Yu Xuan was sitting on the bed, wearing a beautiful cheongsam and a jade necklace. She looked at Mo Han with a shy expression.
Mo Han said, "Yu Xuan."
Mo Han held Yu Xuan tightly in his arms, buried his head in her neckline, and said, "How could it be you, Yu Xuan?"
Yu Xuan said, 'Comrade Hong Zichen, I am here to talk to you on behalf of the organization. Comrade Lao Xu has sacrificed, and the organization has transferred me to replace him.'

Yu Xuan said, "I will be your superior line, do not come to find me unless in special circumstances," "Your subordinate line remains the same, the owner of Mobaizhai, 4321. Maintain phone contact and do not meet easily unless necessary"
Mo Han said, 'Yes, I have the password, what is my next task?'
Yu Xuan said, 'Unfortunately, that password is a fake.'
Mo Han said, 'Fake? How is that possible? I saw with my own eyes that they were using the story of West Chamber.'
Yu Xuan said, 'The moment 4321 relayed to you the password he received, we tried to decode it.'

movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.text: Yu Xuan said, "But realized the translations were incorrect, so you must go back immediately and find the correct password."
Mo Han said, "Okay."
Yu Xuan asked, "Are your injuries completely healed?"
Mo Han said, "I'm fine now."
Yu Xuan said, "You need to take good care of yourself."
Mo Han said, "So did I. I thought I would never see you again in this lifetime."
Yu Xuan said, "I forbid you to talk like that."
Mo Han walked to the window, looked out, and said, "From the day I went north, I never expected to return alive."
Mo Han said, "You know the risky nature of our undercover work; one day you're alive and kicking, and the next you could be a charred corpse."

Mo Han, with head lowered, walked straight towards the door. Yu Xuan, standing behind him, was stunned. He didn't expect Mo Han to be so resolute. He wanted to say something but didn't know how to start.
Mo Han said, "I never thought I'd have the chance to give this to you." Mo Han took out the jade pendant and put it around Yu Xuan's neck.
Mo Han said, "Yu Xuan, thought of so much to say but suddenly found herself at a loss for words."
Yu Xuan asked, "Do you feel the burden is too much to bear alone?"
Mo Han said, "Rest assured, I will definitely complete the mission the organization has entrusted to me."
Yu Xuan said, "You must return safely, promise me that."
Mo Han said, "It's getting late, I should go back now. Take care!"
Yu Xuan stopped Mo Han and said, "Wait." Mo Han turned around, and Yu Xuan walked up behind him, gently stroking his back and said, "Take care."
Yu Xuan, with tears in her eyes, watched Mo Han leave. She turned around, leaned against the headboard, and started to cry.
Mo Han was hiding behind a palm tree, secretly watching Yu Xuan. Che Linlin walked by, and Mo Han quickly turned his head to look at her.
Mo Han, upon seeing Che Linlin, was stunned. He slowly walked forward and asked, "Linlin, what are you doing here?"
Che Linlin asked, "Where is your fiancée? I want to meet her."
Mo Han said, "What are you talking about?"
Che Linlin said, "Yang Mohan, don't play dumb with me. I always thought you were different from other men, a man of your word who doesn't lie."

movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.text: Che Linlin said: "Strange, then where have I seen you before?"
Yang Muchen said, 'Could it be in a dream?'
Che Linlin said, "In a dream."
Yang Muchen asked, 'Have you ever read Tang Xianzu's 'The Peony Pavilion', Miss Che Linlin?'
Che Linlin asked in surprise, 'Mr. Yang Muchen is familiar with it?'
Yang Muchen smiled and said: "A bit. 'Love arises without a reason, it deepens once it starts. The living can die, the dead can live, feelings in dreams do not have to be unreal.'"
Che Linlin said: 'Mr. Yang Muchen knows a lot about 'The Peony Pavilion.''
Che Zhenshan said: "Mr. Yang Muchen is a top student from Huangpu Academy, isn't he?"
Yang Muchen said: "You're too kind, Colonel. I just enjoyed listening to operas since childhood. After graduating from Huangpu, I went to Japan."
Che Linlin asked, 'Mr. Yang Muchen, you have been to Japan?'
Yang Muchen replied, "Yes, I studied in Japan. Have you been there too, Miss Che Linlin?"
Che Linlin asked, "What do you think of Japan, Mr. Yang Muchen?"

Yang Muchen said: 'Japan, it's hard to explain in a few words... The Mukden Incident, the fall of the Three Northeastern Provinces, their crimes are unforgivable. However, not every Japanese person is bad, and....' Recently, our leaders are not fully committed to resisting Japan. They believe in 'pacifying internal turmoil before dealing with external aggression.' Surely you have heard of this, Colonel.'
Yang Muchen said: "So from this perspective, whether Japan is good or bad has nothing to do with us. Our greatest enemy at present is the Communist Party."
Yang Muchen said, "Come, Miss Che Linlin, let's drink to that." Yang Muchen picked up the glass and drank it all in one gulp, and the others also raised their glasses to drink.
Che Zhenshan said, 'Mr. Yang Muchen knows nothing at all. They say ignorance is no sin.'
Che Linlin said, 'Whether he knows or not doesn't matter. What matters is that he's a heartless Japanese lackey.'

Che Zhenshan said: 'He is just conveying the will of his superiors.' 'A person cannot always control their life in this world, can't your father be the same way?' 'Che Linlin, I think that Mr. Yang Muchen is a very talented man.' 'And a favorite of Director Bai, his future is limitless.'
Che Zhenshan asked, 'What does that have to do with me?'
Che Zhenshan said, 'Che Linlin, you're not young anymore. You can't live in the past forever. You need to think about yourself. After all, we still have to live, don't we?'
Che Linlin said: "My affairs are none of your business."
Che Zhenshan, frustrated, paced back and forth in the room, saying, 'Why are you so stubborn?' 'I'm just looking out for you.'
Che Linlin said, "If you truly care for me, you would immediately drive that Mr. Yang away for me."
Che Zhenshan said: 'He is sent by Nanjing, how dare I drive him away?'
Che Linlin said, "That..."

movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.text: Lin Lin said, 'But I was wrong, why did you hide that you have a fiancée, why didn't you tell me earlier, you can say directly if you don't like me, I didn't force you, you shouldn't lie to me.'
Lin Lin said, "I don't need your gratitude"
Mo Han shouted, 'Lin Lin, Lin Lin.'
Lin Lin covered her face and cried, then said, 'Yang Mo Han, we are now even. You leave immediately, leave 101 Group immediately. I never want to see you again.'
Mo Han shouted, 'Lin Lin, Lin Lin!'
Lin Lin struggled and said, 'Let me go, let me go.'
Lin Lin cried and said, "Why are you doing this" "Why are you doing this"
Mo Han said, 'Things are not what you think'
Mo Han said, 'Follow me, trust me.'
Lin Lin looked at Mo Han with a face full of grievance. Mo Han, with a face full of guilt, didn't know how to face her. Lin Lin turned and walked to the sofa, sat down, and leaned back.
Mo Han said, 'I don't want to go with you anymore.' Lin Lin looked at Mo Han in disbelief, then turned and walked away.
The two of them walked into the living room, but did not see the expected Lu Xiao. Mo Han asked, 'Where is the person'?
Mo Han said, 'Yeah, how is it gone'? Mo Han followed Lin Lin to the bedroom, where the curtains were drawn, and the bedside lamp was on.
Lin Lin said, "You are lying to me."
Mo Han said, "No, he was here just now" "Look, the light is still on" "I really didn't lie to you" "I really met with the fellow villagers" "I want to sell the tobacco soil"
Lin Lin asked, "Then why did you lie to Lu Xiao"

Mo Han said, "I know he likes you" "So I dare not offend him" "You also know that the Nanjing government just issued last month" "Temporary Regulations on the Prohibition of Smoking and Drugs" "If Lu Xiao knows that I sell tobacco" "I"
Mo Han said, "I am telling the truth," and Lin Lin, upon hearing this, was stunned.
Mo Han asked, 'What's wrong?'
Lin Lin said, 'Nothing, let's go.'
Mo Han looked around the room, his gaze sweeping over every corner. The furnishings were luxurious, yet there was a sense of desolation.
Che Zhen Shan said, 'Commander, that kid surnamed Yang is too out of line, he has a woman at home and still wants to take advantage of Lin Lin, what the hell is this.'
Che Zhen Shan asked, '"How do you know" "Have you been to his house"'

movie101_7176565114756137528_2760_2940.text: The commander said, 'Still the woman who has seen him.'
Lu Xiao said, 'No, that Yang kid told me himself.'
The group leader said: "Since you haven’t seen it with your own eyes, is there any conclusive evidence? Merely on Mo Han's word, you're so readily convinced. Isn’t that a bit improper?"
Lu Xiao said, 'Group leader, why do you always side with him?'

The scene shifts, and Group leader says: 'Whether I am siding with him or doing this for Lin Lin, you should be clear in your heart. Ever since Mo Han arrived, look how happy Lin Lin has been. It’s as if we’re back to our childhood days. That’s more important than anything.'
The scene shifts, and the adjutant says, 'Ever since that Yang guy came, I haven’t had a single good day.'
The group leader said, 'Lu Xiao, a soldier should be competing on the battlefield, not competing in jealousy. Look at yourself.'

The scene shifts to Mo Han's room, where he is sitting on a chair, listlessly staring at a loudspeaker on the table. He reaches for the record player, but his hand freezes in mid-air. He slumps back onto the chair, and the record stops spinning.
Mo Han said, 'What’s wrong with you, not a word for so long? You must be bothered by something, you. You are always so suspicious, always overthinking.'
Mo Han, with a cigarette in his mouth, sat down on the sofa, and Lin Lin sat down next to him.
Mo Han: "Lin Lin, life is short. Who doesn’t want to fall in love passionately, who doesn’t want to spend a lifetime with the one they love?"

Mo Han said, 'But we happen to live in such times, having today doesn’t guarantee tomorrow. We can hardly ensure our own lives, who would dare to touch love so lightly? Maybe right now, outside the window, someone is aiming a gun at me.'

The group leader walked in with a few soldiers, and Mo Han was sitting on the sofa with his hands behind his back. The group leader said, 'See, what did I say, confess in front of Lin Lin. Did you go on a date with your fiancée that day or not? Speak.'
Mo Han said, 'What if I tell you no, would you believe me?'

The Nationalist officer slapped Mo Han and said, "You’ve got quite a stiff mouth, huh? If not the fiancée, then who are you sneaking around meeting with? The Communist Party? Do you dare admit it? If you dare, I’ve got the guts to put a bullet in you, right here."
Mo Han said, "Lu Xiao, why should I admit anything to you, what are you to decide?"
The Kuomintang officer ordered his men to beat him, saying, '"Brothers, beat him to death for me.'"
Lin Lin, who had been pushed to the ground, suddenly pulled out a gun and pointed it at the officer, saying, 'Get out.'

movie101_7176565114756137528_2940_3120.text: Lu Xiao, seeing Lin Lin's resolute expression, slowly put away the gun and said, 'Lin Lin, he is a man engaged to be married, what are you to him anyway?'
Lin Lin said, 'Even if I were a piece of rotten meat, I wouldn't let a fly like you linger on me. Get out.'
The officer looked at him and said, "Fine, Yang. You're lucky this time. We'll see about that. Let's go."
Lin Lin fired a shot at Lu Xiao, but Lu Xiao dodged it by bending down. Lin Lin's hand was injured by the recoil of the gun. She knelt down in pain, crying out.

Mo Han, who was sleeping on the other side, was awakened by the sound of the radio and noticed something unusual with the girl next to him. He turned on the light, got out of bed, and walked to the girl's bedside.

Mo Han sat at the bedside, holding Lin Lin's hand, watching her sleep. He gently stroked her hand with his other hand, his eyes full of affection. Lin Lin's face was serene, her delicate features highlighted by the moonlight pouring through the window. Mo Han looked at her, lost in thought. He lowered his head and placed a kiss on Lin Lin's hand, then stood up and moved to the other side of the bed.
Mo Han, who was sitting on the bed, heard the sound of the door closing, thought for a moment, then got up and walked towards the door.
Mo Han, who was sleeping on the other side, was awakened by the sound of the door closing. He turned over and saw Lin Lin's bed was empty. He immediately got up and checked Lin Lin's room.

Mo Han, who had been beaten, was still not finished. He continued to search under the bed, but the pillow cover was empty. He then grabbed the blanket and shook it, but the ringtone still did not fall out.
Mo Han sat on the toilet lid, flipping through a book in his hand. The book was tattered and worn out, with missing pages and a dirty cover.

Mo Han sat on the toilet lid reading a book. The book was about the tragic love story of a young man and a young woman from different social classes. The young man's family was poor, and he died of illness. The young woman, deeply in love, couldn't accept the young man's death and died herself. The book was filled with tragedy and sorrow, making Mo Han feel very emotional.
The next day, Lin Lin was still sleeping in bed, half-awake, when she heard some noise. She turned her head and saw Mo Han packing her luggage. She asked, "What are you doing?"
Mo Han, startled, quickly stood up and said, "I'm looking for clothes."
Mo Han said, "Looking for clothes? They're in the bathroom. You were sick last night, I was exhausted."
Mo Han said, 'Then I'll be going back first.' Mo Han got up and left, leaving Lin Lin alone in the room. He turned off the light, and the room instantly darkened.
Lu Xiao said, "Please connect me to 4321." The phone was silent for a long time, and Lu Xiao repeated, "Please connect me to 4321 once more."

The scene shifts to Lu Xiao, who is still eavesdropping on the conversation between Lin Lin and Mo Han. He is getting impatient, and the phone line starts to make a buzzing sound. He listens carefully but still cannot hear the conversation clearly.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3120_3300.text: Hong Zichen picked up the phone and said, 'Hello.'
The scene shifts, and the next day, Hong Zichen arrives at the pharmacy. The notice on the pillar states: One week later, contact Fenglin Road Jiashi Great Pharmacy.

Hong Zichen, who was passing by, was attracted by the commotion and went over to check. He saw the notice on the wall stating that the rental income from the house rented to the tobacco factory was to be donated to the comfort women. He immediately tore down the notice.
Hong Zichen walked out of the room, looked around, and then headed straight for the door. Just as he was about to open the door and leave, he turned back to look at Man.
The man walked in and said: 'Old Xu, I'm here.'
The man said, 'Hong Zichen, come on in.'
The man in black took off his hat and said, 'Friend, we've met before, but I remember, you weren't dressed like this at the time.'
Hong Zichen said: 'You've got the wrong person.'
The man in the hat chased after him, shouting: 'Friend, don't go, let's have a chat.' 'Friend, friend, friend, don't leave.' 'Hey, friend, friend, watch out, friend, hold up.'
The scene shifts, and the Japanese officer is still searching for the Eighth Route soldier.

The scene shifts to the street, where the two are still at a standoff. The gunfire has ceased, and the two are now staring at each other. Suddenly, Hong Zichen makes a move, but is quickly stopped by Man.
The man pointed the gun at Hong Zichen and said, 'Pal, if I reveal your identity, you know what fate awaits you.'
Hong Zichen, with a smirk, said: 'Bro, you and I, we're cut from the same cloth.'
The man asked: 'What do you mean?'
Hong Zichen said: 'It's all about money in the end. I'm just doing some business with the Communists.'
The man smiled and said, 'Not bad.'

Hong Zichen said: 'Bro, in this war between the Nationalists and Communists, who knows who will win. We profiteers shouldn’t be at odds. What's more, revealing each other's identities benefits neither of us. Let's do this instead: you don't disclose my identity, and I'll give you a sum of money. As for your identity, I'll keep quiet, but you'll need to provide me with information, and I'll pay you extra for it. How about that?'
The man in the beret looked at him with a smile, and Hong Zichen also smiled slightly.
Hong Zichen said: 'Deal.'
The man said: "My friend, from the moment I saw you, I knew we were birds of a feather, lamentably meeting too late."

Che Linlin said, 'The key is not with me. It seems to be in the commander's office safe. Apart from my father, no one has seen it.'
Yang Mo Han said: "But it's okay. If necessary, we can kill the donkey after it's done working. They wouldn't dare do anything."
Che Linlin, with tears in her eyes, said, 'But...'

Che Zhen Shan said: 'All right, you should rest early. I'm going to meet the commander.' After saying this, Che Zhen Shan left the room. Che Linlin stood in the room, watching Che Zhen Shan leave. After Che Zhen Shan left, Che Linlin went to the door and peered through the curtain. Che Zhen Shan was holding a flashlight, inspecting the surroundings of the building. He walked slowly, carefully observing the environment.

movie101_7176565114756137528_5100_5280.text: Mo Han slowly raised his gun, aiming at Lin Lin. Lin Lin was not afraid at all and raised her gun as well. Mo Han asked, 'Lin Lin, what are you doing here?'
Mo Han asked, 'What are you doing?'
Mo Han said, 'At this point, I don't want to hide it from you any longer, actually, I am...'
Mo Han slowly lowered the gun, and Lin Lin, with a trembling voice, said, 'My life is in your hands, go ahead and shoot.'

Lin Lin said, "Mo Han, you've been using me all along, haven't you? Using me as a shield, gaining my father's trust, getting a foothold here to gather information. Am I right? Aren't you afraid of exposing yourself, aren't you afraid of dying?"

Mo Han said, 'Ever since I embarked on this path, I've regarded myself as already dead. To console the countless unjust souls like your mother's, for the happiness of hundreds of millions of suffering compatriots, for a new world, my death means nothing.'

Mo Han said, 'Lin Lin, the Japanese devils are now burning, killing, and looting everywhere, destroying our homes. Our countrymen are in deep suffering. We are all Chinese, and as a conscientious Chinese, facing national disaster, the Kuomintang not only fails to resist but also targets the communists. How can one not be angry, how can one not be heartbroken?'

Mo Han slowly walked up to Lin Lin, his eyes full of guilt. He said, 'Lin Lin, for the harm I've caused you, I solemnly apologize. This apology has been weighing on my heart so heavily that I could hardly breathe. That's why I planned to take you away and make it up to you with my actions.'
Lin Lin said, 'Thank you for your kindness and honesty.'
Lin Lin thought for a moment and said, "Try my birthday."
Mo Han tried to open the milk box again, but it still didn't budge. He looked at the lock and said, 'It won't open.'
Mo Han said, "Try my mother's birthday, 1208."
Lin Lin said, 'Try my mother's death anniversary, 1011.'
Mo Han opened the door, and Lin Lin, with tears in her eyes, watched him walk out.

movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.text: Mo Han sat down and said, 'Don't be sad. Let's go. Didn't you say you would be willing to go with me?'
Lin Lin said, 'If I leave, what about my father? You go by yourself.'
Che Zhen Shan, who had been hiding in the cupboard, immediately took out a gun and aimed at Mo Han, saying, "You're too naive to fight with me."
Che Zhen Shan said, "Come with me."
Che Zhen Shan said, 'Let him go.'
Che Zhen Shan said, 'Lin Lin, put the gun down. Do you want my life?'
Lin Lin said, 'My life was given by you. It was also given by him. I don't want him to die by your hand.'
Che Zhen Shan said, "Do you know how dangerous his identity is to us?" "Lin Lin, he is a Communist."
Lin Lin said, 'I don't care which party he belongs to. As long as it's a party against the Japanese invaders, it's a good party. If you really love me, let him go immediately. I'll count to three.'
Lin Lin said, 'One.'
Mo Han shouted, 'Lin Lin!'
Che Zhen Shan said, 'One.' 'Two.'
Che Zhen Shan said, 'Lin Lin, why are you forcing me like this?'
Mo Han said, '"Give me the gun.'"
Che Zhen Shan, with a stern face, pointed the gun at the couple and said, "You and your whole family better behave."
Che Zhen Shan shouted, "Lu Xiao!"
Lu Xiao said, 'Che Zhen Shan, hmph, the commander will be here soon. He will tell you whether my career as an adjutant ends here, or your career as a regiment commander ends.'
Che Zhen Shan pointed the gun at Lu Xiao and said, "Lu Xiao, you beast, do you believe I won't shoot you?"
Lu Xiao said, 'Ah, don't be so agitated, my dear commander. Put the gun down.'
Che Zhen Shan, with a fierce look, pointed the gun at the three of them and said, "Or I'll blow your whole family up."
Lu Xiao said, 'Commander, this is what is called the student surpassing the master.'
Lu Xiao slowly lowered his gun and said, 'What a pity, Secretary Yang. You ended up mixed with a female Communist.'
Lin Lin said, 'Lu Xiao, thank you for giving me, the honorable title of Communist.'
Lu Xiao said, 'Then you should thank that female Communist. It was she who informed us about you as the hidden operative. You thought you could run, but you couldn't escape my bullet, Lu Xiao.'
Che Zhen Shan drew a gun and aimed at Mo Han, shouting, 'Get down!'
Che Zhen Shan and Lu Xiao were still fighting when Mo Han suddenly burst in, shooting Che Zhen Shan in the leg. Mo Han quickly helped Lin Lin up and said, 'Quick, get up!' 'Let's go.'
Che Zhen Shan, who had been pushed out, quickly turned back and asked, 'Wait, wait, where are we going?'
Lin Lin said, 'We'll talk outside. The commander will be here soon. We have to leave now, father.'
Che Zhen Shan said, "You finally called me father." "After all these years, you finally called me father."
Che Zhen Shan said, 'Do you know how many years I've waited?'

movie101_7176565114756137528_5460_5640.text: Che Zhen Shan said, "My heart is broken from the waiting."
Lin Lin cried and said, 'I always thought you had forgotten mother, but when I used mom's memorial day as the password to open the safe, I realized I was wrong, I'm sorry, Dad.'
Che Zhen Shan said, 'Foolish child, you and your mother are the apples of my eye, the ones I always worry about.'
Che Zhen Shan said, "Dad never remarried all these years," "just to preserve the love he held for your mother. Child, you must go, the further the better."

Che Zhen Shan took out the password and said, "Take these passwords with you, I have another copy." Che Zhen Shan handed the password to Mo Han, then turned to Lin Lin and said, "Mo Han, Lin Lin is in your care now, take good care of her."
Che Zhen Shan said, 'Even if one day I'm gone, at least there's an explanation to her mother.'
Lin Lin said, 'Dad, let's leave together, from now on you can be a common folk, your daughter will take good care of you.'
Che Zhen Shan said, 'Enough dawdling, take the password and hurry on, I'll deal with them here, otherwise, none of the three of us can escape.'
Che Zhen Shan, who had been knocked down, got up again and continued to hack at the Japanese soldiers. Lin Lin shouted, 'Mo Han!'
Che Zhen Shan fired a shot, hitting Lin Lin in the left shoulder. Mo Han quickly caught Lin Lin, who fainted in his arms. Mo Han shouted, 'Lin Lin!'
Che Zhen Shan, struggling to speak, said, '"You beast, Mo Han, go save Lin Lin, hurry, take good care of her.'"
Che Zhen Shan, who was choking, couldn't speak, and could only shake his head from side to side.
Che Zhen Shan, who had just rushed out, was shot and injured. He struggled to get up, but was forced back by gunfire from the enemy.

The scene shifts to the next day, with the rising sun hanging high in the sky. Che Zhen Shan, having received the news, arrived at the courtyard of the Wang residence. The young master's room was sealed off with a lock, and Che Zhen Shan, with the help of two soldiers, forcibly pushed open the door.

movie101_7176565114756137528_600_780.text: The scene shifts to the telegraph room, where the telegrapher is sending messages. A soldier comes in and hands him a piece of paper, and he quickly types on the machine. The soldier takes the paper back and leaves. The telegrapher then hands the paper to the next person in line.
Secretary Yang: 'Help me with number 4321.'
The scene shifts to the telegraph office. A soldier is sending a telegram: "Hello, brother, I want to send you some money." "You mentioned last time about moving." "Didn't move, right?"

Secretary Yang: 'Okay, our special agent will arrive at noon tomorrow. From the division to the regiment headquarters for an inspection. I might go back to Nanjing or maybe another place, so don't reply after receiving the money.' He hung up quickly after finishing.

The scene shifts to a room where a group of people are gathered around a table with a map. One person pointed at the map and said, 'Comrades, Special Agent Bai is coming from the division to the regiment headquarters. He'll pass through one of these routes. Tonight we'll plant mines here and ambush with machine guns at this high point.'
Che Zhen Shan: "Look to the right." "Look forward."
A soldier runs up and says: 'Report, Colonel. Just received a call from the division. Special Agent Bai has switched to a plane and is expected to arrive shortly.'
Che Zhen Shan: "Got it, you may go."
The soldiers responded: "Yes."
Che Zhen Shan says, 'Secretary Yang, Special Agent Bai is arriving soon. You must be excited.'
Secretary Yang laughs and says: "Indeed, a bit."
Lu Xiang says: "I'm not excited, I'm nervous, extremely nervous."
Secretary Yang says: 'Colonel, with you saying that, you've made me nervous as well. Whenever I get nervous, I feel like going to the restroom.'
Che Zhen Shan: "Alright, go quickly and come back soon." "Your superior will be here shortly."
Secretary Yang, with a stern face, walked into the bathroom. The room was empty, and he looked around before walking out.
The scene shifts to the office of the Japanese army, where a soldier is anxiously pacing back and forth.
The scene shifts to the battalion command room, where the phone rings. The brigade commander answers the phone and says, "Please connect me to 4321."
Che Zhen Shan, who was wiping his hands, stopped and said, "Special Agent Bai will be here soon." "Where is Secretary Yang?" "Lu Xiang, go check."
Che Zhen Shan, with tears in his eyes, slowly put down the receiver. He knew that with the current military situation, even if he were to beg for mercy, it would be futile.
Che Zhen Shan, who was originally walking slowly, immediately quickened his pace and walked briskly towards the restroom.
Secretary Yang enters the restroom, and Guard follows in.

movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.text: The scene shifts to the first battalion of the first regiment of the third division, where the soldiers are still practicing their salutes.
The car slowly stopped in front of the building, and the people on the car were getting off one after another. The car door opened, and Che Zhen Shan and Lu Xiao got out of the car.
A soldier reported to Che Zhen Shan: 'Commander, we've arrived.'
Che Zhen Shan said, 'Identity confirmation.'
Che Zhen Shan: 'Mmm.'
Che Zhen Shan salutes and says, 'Commander of the 101st Regiment Che Zhen Shan welcomes the special envoy's secretary for guidance.'
Che Zhen Shan replied, 'I'm here to learn.'
Che Zhen Shan said, 'Secretary Yang, you're too kind. I originally planned to personally receive you but I couldn't leave due to an urgent matter. I hope you can forgive me.'
Che Zhen Shan quickly responded: 'Ah, not at all, not at all.'
Che Zhen Shan: 'Please.'
The officer replied: 'Good.' The officer led the way, and the group walked up the steps to the building.
Che Zhen Shan said, 'Secretary Yang, you must be tired from your journey. I have organized a welcome banquet for you at Si Xi Grand Hotel, the best restaurant in Liucheng.'
Che Zhen Shan said, 'Commander, you're too kind.'
Che Zhen Shan said, 'Please, come in.'

The leader continued, 'Comrade Hong Zichen, the organization has decided to send you to infiltrate the Nationalist 101st Regiment. Your primary mission is to obtain the code. You will go disguised as the secretary of the Nanjing government's special envoy, Yang Mohan, and inspect their work.'
The scene shifts to the attic, where the leader tells Hong Zichen, 'We have already captured the real Yang Mohan, you must act cautiously, obtain the code by clever means, not by force.'
Hong Zichen said, 'Yes.'
The scene shifts to the Liberation Army Daily, where the staff is bustling.
Che Zhen Shan said, 'Secretary Yang, you are so young, yet you have gained the appreciation of the special envoy. You have a bright future ahead.'

Che Zhen Shan said, 'I'm not married yet.'
Che Zhen Shan said, 'I have hands and feet; I don't need anyone to take care of me.'
Che Zhen Shan said, 'Miss Che, this is black chicken soup personally ordered by Lu Xiao to rejuvenate you.'

Che Zhen Shan introduced: "This is my daughter Che Linlin," "she is in charge of the radio translation work," "she was frightened a few days ago," "her mood hasn't been great," "I hope Secretary Yang can excuse her."
Lu Xiao, after thinking for a moment, suggested, "Since Miss Che is upset, why not invite her to join us for a few drinks, to help ease her mood?"
Che Zhen Shan looked at him and said, 'That doesn't seem very appropriate.'
Lu Xiao asked, 'Is there any inconvenience?'
Che Zhen Shan quickly responded: 'No, no, it would indeed be an honor for my daughter.'
Che Zhen Shan said, "Che Linlin, Secretary Yang from Nanjing, is inviting you to dine at Si Xi Grand Hotel."
The woman said, 'Thank you, you two are such good people, thank you.'
Che Zhen Shan: "It was snowing that day, it was exceptionally cold, and the old lady also said."
Che Zhen Shan said, 'Miss Che, you must be mistaken.'
Che Linlin said, 'No, I think it was you.' 'Think again.'
Lu Xiao said: 'But I have never been to Liucheng.'
Che Linlin said, 'How is that possible? That's strange.'

movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.text: Secretary Yang: "Che Linlin."
He walked to the door, hesitated for a moment, then raised his hand and knocked. After a while, there was no response. He knocked again, but still, no one came to open the door.

The soldier said: "Deputy Lu, I suddenly had a stomachache, I didn't see the sign clearly."
Che Linlin said: "Didn't see clearly, my foot! You did it on purpose."
Lu Xiang, holding his stomach, said: "Che Linlin, I'm really sorry, I just can't hold it anymore."
Secretary Yang asked: "Che Linlin, are you okay?"
Secretary Yang said: "Oh no, I can't hold it any longer."
Secretary Yang, while using the restroom, said to Lu Xiang: "Hurry up, the commissioner will be here soon."
He slowly raised his gun, aiming at the target, and then fired.
He slowly walked out of the bathroom, then quickly walked towards the door. The soldiers outside were still guarding, and upon seeing him, they immediately straightened up.
He opened the door and walked in, shouting: "Deputy Lu, Deputy Lu, where's Secretary Yang?"
The guard said: "Commissioner Bai has arrived."
Secretary Yang said: "Commissioner Bai, he... he..."
Secretary Yang asked: "What's wrong with him?"
Secretary Yang said: "He had an accident."
Secretary Yang said: "What's wrong, spit it out quickly"
Secretary Yang said: "As soon as he got off the plane, a beggar with a bomb strapped to him rushed out of the bushes. When he got close, the commander shot him. But, but..."
Secretary Yang asked in disbelief: "The commander is dead?"
Secretary Yang said: "The commander dodged quickly and injured his leg, but Commissioner Bai, he... he"
The commander walked in and said: "What kind of guards are you?" Then he walked to the window and shouted: "Oh my, Commissioner Bai, how did you die so suddenly?"
Secretary Yang said: "Alright, Secretary Yang, he's not your real father. Just wail a bit and it's enough."
Lu Xiang cried out: "He is my real father"
Lu Xiang said: "The man is already dead, what's the use of crying?"
The man said: "Deputy Lu, the commissioner might still be alive."
Secretary Yang said: "Ah."
Secretary Yang, upon hearing this, was so shocked that he exclaimed: "What, not dead?" He then covered his face and cried.
The soldier slapped the table and shouted: 'Didn't you say he wasn’t dead earlier?' 'Secretary Yang, let's go and check now.'
The scene shifts to the entrance of the hospital. A nurse is about to go downstairs when she encounters two military police officers searching for someone.

movie101_7176565114756137528_960_1140.text: Che Zhen Shan walked into the room and said: "Yang Mo Han, you came just in time. The special commissioner is eager to see you."

Yang Mo Han: "Commissioner, I'm Xiao Yang, Yang Mo Han." "Commissioner, you'll be fine." "Commissioner, you'll be fine." "Got it, I understand." "Commander, the commissioner is worried he won't make it, and he has something to tell me privately."
Che Zhen Shan said: "Alright, we'll go out first."
Che Zhen Shan said: "I'll call you."
Che Zhen Shan said: 'Alright, let's go.'
