Yang Mo Han walked into the ward, saw Bai Te Pai Yuan looking at him, and then turned to look at the person lying on the bed.
Yang Mo Han shouted: 'Someone come quick! Doctor, Commander, someone come quick!'
Yang Mo Han shouted: 'Quick, doctor, quick, doctor.'
Che Zhen Shan asked the doctor anxiously: 'Doctor, how is he?'
Che Zhen Shan said: 'It's too late.'
Yang Mo Han said: 'Commander, how can I explain this to our superiors when I get back? It's a death sentence when I return.'
Che Zhen Shan: 'Yang Mo Han Secretary, please accept my condolences.'
Yang Mo Han said: "Commander, you're the only one who can save me now." "As long as you temporarily take me in," "Let me think of a solution," "I'll repay this great favor in the future,"
Che Zhen Shan quickly said: 'No, no, no, Secretary Yang, we can talk about this.'
Soldier ran up to him, and Lu Xiao stopped him, saying: 'Hold on, why are you in such a hurry?'
Soldier reported: 'Reporting to Deputy Officer Lu, Ms. Che has been kidnapped. A group of kidnappers took her to the back mountain, saying they want to...'

movie101_7228950501038293560_1140_1320.text: Shui Xiu rode her bicycle to the county government building to find Security Guard. She stopped at the entrance and asked Security Guard, "Comrade, may I ask who you are looking for?"

Shui Xiu said, "I'm looking for the county head, I want to make a complaint." Security Guard asked, "What's the matter?" Shui Xiu said, "You should take complaints to the Petition Bureau, just turn right outside the door."
Security Guard said, "You should take complaints to the Petition Bureau, just turn right outside the door." After saying this, Security Guard left.
The scene shifts to the village where Feng Yucheng is pruning apricot trees. The apricot trees in the village are neatly arranged, and the apricots are plump and succulent.
He carried the corn on his shoulder and walked towards the road. The road was already piled high with corn, and he joined the crowd in the rain, unloading the corn from his shoulder.
The scene shifts to a man in a red jacket, holding a hoe, running in the rain. He was calling out, 'Yucheng,' as he ran.
The scene shifts to the courtyard, where the two are still fighting, with the man in red clothes continuously trying to get on top of the man in black clothes.
Shui Xiu, who had just finished work, was soaked in the rain. She pushed her bike to a bus stop and waited for the bus under a billboard.

Shui Xiu, holding the quilt, walked out of the house and saw a downpour coming down from the sky. She wanted to wait for the rain to stop, but the downpour showed no signs of stopping. Shui Xiu had no choice but to hold the quilt in one hand and carry her bicycle in the other, heading towards the bus stop.
Shui Xiu arrived at the entrance of a small inn, parked her bike, and walked in. She asked, "Are you looking for a room to stay?"
Female Boss said, "Fifty for one night."
Shui Xiu looked at the keys on the table, then at the Female Boss, and finally at the keys in her hand. She then put the keys on the table.
Female Boss said: "If it's too expensive, too expensive, go home." "If you're not staying, then leave."

Shui Xiu, holding a bag, walked into the courtyard, looking around. She then walked to the door of a house, hesitated for a moment, and knocked. After a while, no one came to open the door. Shui Xiu, holding the bag, stood in the rain, looking around in confusion.

The scene shifts to a night scene, where Feng Yucheng rides a bicycle to a restaurant. He parks the bike at the entrance, walks in, and sits down. He orders a drink and starts to drink it in big gulps.

Feng Yucheng said: "My Shui Xiu, she has always been so good to me." "We've never had a fight." "She is unwilling to eat or wear anything for herself." "She gave all the money for my medical treatment." "If it were any other woman, she would’ve left me long ago." "You have no idea, I--"

movie101_7228950501038293560_1320_1500.text: Feng Yucheng said: "I, I don't deserve to be a man."

The scene shifts, and it starts to rain heavily. Feng Yucheng rides his bicycle to the county government building, where he has arranged to meet Shui Xiu. He parks his bike at the entrance, runs to the door, and pushes open the door to enter.
Feng Yucheng, with a face full of fatigue, supported his forehead with his hands, his mind filled with recent events, and he couldn't help but sob.

The scene shifts, and Feng Yucheng is seen covering his face and crying. The voice of the female host continues: 'Facing this grieving man before me, I don't know how to console him. Actually, Feng Yucheng having a woman like Shui Xiu, he is fortunate.'
The scene shifts, and a man said: "Shui Xiu went to the county town for her legal rights." "Though we don't know the outcome, she was courageous."

The night was dark and gloomy, like a black curtain hanging in the sky. The rain poured down in a torrent, as if trying to wash away all the sins of humanity. The streets were deserted, and the cold wind blew through the alleys. Girl sat on the steps of the county government building, hugging her knees and shaking from the cold.

The next day, Shui Xiu arrived early at the county government building, sitting on the steps of the entrance, holding a pillow and a bag, dozing off. She was awakened by the sound of a car door closing and hurriedly got up, dusting off her clothes.

The scene shifts, Shui Xiu is riding a bicycle on the bridge, with a bag of pastries hanging in front of the bike, and a pot of chili sauce placed on the rear seat. Shui Xiu occasionally touches the bridge railing, looking around.
Shui Xiu was pedaling hard, her forehead already covered in sweat. She was about to catch up with the bus when it suddenly stopped, and she fell off her bike.
The next day, Feng Yucheng rode his bicycle on the road by the river. The weather was clear, and the river was calm.

The scene shifts to the village, where the trees are turning autumnal, and Feng Yucheng is riding a bicycle, carrying a basket of manure. He is dressed in coarse cloth, and his hair is a mess. He rides the bike slowly, occasionally stopping to push the bike forward.

Shui Xiu, who had been pedaling hard, was now panting heavily. She looked up at the road ahead, but her mind was in complete disarray. She didn't know what to think, what to do. She could only keep moving forward, her heart in turmoil.

The scene shifts, and Shui Xiu is seen riding a bicycle, pedaling hard. She is wearing a simple cotton-padded jacket, and her hair is tied up with a rubber band. Shui Xiu is bouncing along the rugged mountain road, her expression tense with concern.
Shui Xiu, who was riding her bike, saw this scene, stopped her bike, and looked around. She saw the thugs had already left, so she parked her bike and ran to the place where Girl had fallen.

movie101_7228950501038293560_1500_1680.text: Shui Xiu said: "I'm fine, Yu Cheng."
Yu Cheng said: "Xiù, as long as you're okay, we won't fight for anything."
Shui Xiu said: 'Why not fight? I just want to fight to keep my dignity.'
Yu Cheng said: "Shui Xiu."
Shui Xiu's daughter stood up and said, "Dad."
Uncle Lao Qing walked into the room and said: "Uncle Lao Qing has come."
Uncle Lao Qing, who was about to go out, was startled by the scene in front of him. He closed the door and said, "Shui Xiu, you really are something, huh."
Shui Xiu, who was lying on the bed, suddenly sat up and said, 'Uncle Lao Qing.'

Uncle Lao Qing said: 'Our village of Yingtan.' 'For decades, no one has ever lodged a complain.' 'You are really breaking new ground.' 'Shui Xiu, just listen to your uncle, stop causing trouble, okay?'
Shui Xiu said: "Uncle Lao Qing, don't be angry. Now it's not just a matter of our family and Yu Cheng. I didn't intend to blow things up. I've checked, his Liu Yuhai's slate factory is illegal."
Uncle Lao Qing said: "Illegal? What law does it break? That Liu Yuhai has been operating legally for many years. He pays so much tax every year."
Shui Xiu said: "I don't care about what taxes he pays. I just know it's illegal."
Uncle Lao Qing said: "Alright, alright, that's enough. Let's stick to the facts. This matter, let it go already. Why should you demand that he bears all the responsibility when you guys get hurt?"
Shui Xiu said: "Uncle Lao Qing, please stay out of this. I must get to the bottom of it."
Uncle Lao Qing said: "Fine, go ahead and sue then, go on and sue, you're just like this, straightforward, go ahead and sue to the end."

Uncle Lao Qing, who was standing by the door, heard this and turned to look at Shui Xiu. Shui Xiu, with tears in her eyes, reached out to grab the blanket. Seeing this, Uncle Lao Qing quickly walked over and handed the blanket to Shui Xiu. Shui Xiu, holding the blanket, sat up and began to cry loudly.
Shui Xiu, with a flushed face from fever, was still smiling at the villagers. Liu Yuhai came in and asked, 'How did it go?'
Er Niu said: "Shui Xiu came back from filing a complaint." "Guess what?" "No luck."
Liu Yuhai said: "What does this show? It shows that with reason, you can walk the world, without it, you can't take a step."
Er Niu said: "Exactly. But it's just that, that."
Liu Yuhai asked: 'Just what?'
Liu Yuhai said: "It's just that Shui Xiu filed a complaint this time." "Against you."

movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.text: Liu Yuhai said: "What, destroying the environment?"
Liu Yuhai said: "Destroying the environment, isn't this woman possessed or something?"
Liu Yuhai said: "In that case, for the next couple of days, don't go to work. Keep a close eye on Shui Xiu for me. If anything happens, hurry back and notify me."
Shui Xiu said: "No problem." Shui Xiu took out a photo of the two washing clothes from her pocket, and Wu Zheng also pulled out a photo of Girl.
Shui Xiu said: "This photo."
Wu Zheng said: "This was taken inadvertently when I was in England for the talks." "Shui Xiu, I have something I'd like to discuss with you."
Shui Xiu said: "Whatever it is, just tell me."
Wu Zheng said: "I'm thinking of organizing a photo exhibition in a while, and would like to use your portrait rights. What do you think?"
Shui Xiu asked: "What, portrait rights?"
Wu Zheng explained: "It means that I want to use your image from my photos, I need to have your consent."
Wu Zheng: "You've made my sister-in-law look so good in the photo," "why wouldn't we agree?" Right, sister-in-law?"
Shui Xiu said: "Wu Zheng brother, I don't know much about this portrait right thing, but if you want to use it, just do it."
Wu Zheng said: "That's great."
Wu Zheng took out a few papers and said: "Look at this, this is your fee for the use of the portrait rights."
Shui Xiu said: "Wu Zheng brother, what are you doing? You take my picture and then offer me money; that's not acceptable."
Wu Zheng said: "Shui Xiu, listen to me... When I use your portrait right, it is a requirement to compensate you."
Shui Xiu said: "I don't care about rules or regulations, all I know is I can't take this money."
Shui Xiu said: "Wu Zheng brother, if you keep doing this, then I won't allow you to use my portrait rights at all."
Girl: "Wu Zheng brother, can I give you some feedback on this photo?"
Wu Zheng said: "Sure, go ahead." Wu Zheng handed over the photo, and Girl took it with a puzzled look.
Girl asked: "There are so many beautiful spots in our village, why didn’t you take pictures of them?"

Through the joint action of wetland plants, organic substrates, and microorganisms, and through multi-layer filtration, degrade pollutants, purify water quality and discharge rationally. This method of sewage treatment is itself quite low-carbon and environmentally friendly, plus the investment cost for individual projects is low, it's a purely ecological treatment approach.'
Woman in Red Clothes said: 'Sewage treatment tanks, aren't those things found in cities?'
Another woman echoed: 'Exactly,' 'Building a sewage pool at our doorstep,' 'That would smell terrible.'
The crowd responded: 'Yeah.'
Meng Ting said: 'Everyone, take a look. This is a model of a constructed wetland from the next village. This afternoon, you can all follow me for a visit, and once you see it, you'll understand.'

movie101_7235213933035192887_420_600.text: Chun Hu said: "What is going on here"
The man in the middle handed the paper to Chun Hu and said: 'Chun Hu, take a look'

The scene shifts, and the three brothers are sitting in the office. The third brother is reading the agreement: 'To ensure there is proof of this arrangement, we're putting this in writing as a testament.'
The man in the floral shirt said: "This is all what we agreed upon back then, written in black and white"
Old Father said: '"The two of us elders, each living in a different house, if one of us falls ill in the middle of the night, no one would even know, let alone take care of us.'"
Second Brother said: "My old man and I want to chat and speak our minds," "but we have to do it behind their backs," "it feels like being thieves."
Old Father: "This, both of us living separately, my legs are not good. Last night, I got up to get some water and fell. When my old wife found out," "she wanted to move in to take care of me"
Mother said: 'But Eldest Brother adamantly refused. He said if she moved in, the two brothers would no longer look after us.'
Chun Hu said: "Oh dear, living together is no big deal."

Eldest Brother said: "Of course not" "My dad's health is poor" "My mom just had surgery last year" "If both of them live in my house" "Food, drinks, medical expenses, all would be on me alone. How can I afford it? And he wouldn't help."
Second Brother said: 'What, I don't help? Who paid the twenty thousand yuan hospital fee for mom's surgery last year?'

Chun Hu said: 'Stop arguing, aren't you ashamed? This is about supporting your parents, not contracting a turtle pond. Genwang, Genxing, I initially agreed to let you join our turtle farming cooperative, but now, I need to reconsider.'

Chun Hu said: "If you don't support your parents, it means you have no character. And people without character are not welcome in our cooperative. When we'll allow you to join depends on your future conduct, understood?"
Old Father said: "Chun Hu, in the future, can my old wife and I still live together?"

Chun Hu said: "Don't worry" "This agreement is not valid" "There are laws in the country" "Just because you signed an agreement to separately support each parent" "doesn't mean you only take care of your own" "If you don't look after them," "it constitutes the crime of abandonment." "Even if you take it to court," "the judge will likely side with me." "Alright," "regarding the issue of supporting parents," "don't just think about how much money you are spending."

movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.text: The mediator said: "Think about the old man's wishes," "take good care of the old man's health," "that's settled then," "the two old men will live together," "as for the support payments," "the two brothers will split them equally."
The scene shifts to a small path in Luotang Village, where a cow is tied to a stake, and a calf is nursing.
Old Secretary and Mayor Yang shook hands and greeted each other: "Oh, Mayor Yang, hello, hello, hello" "Old Secretary, hello, hello, how's your health?" "Pretty good, pretty good"
Old Secretary said: "I heard your blood pressure has been a bit high recently. You really need to take care of yourself."
Old Secretary said: "It's a minor issue, no big deal, no big deal."
Old Secretary said: "Please, please, please, come on in."

The scene shifts to the village party secretary's house, where the village party secretary is welcoming guests. The man said: "Please, please, I've come today, mainly to prepare for the re-election of our Camellia Village Party organization, to get a sense of things."
A man asked: "Mayor Yang, are there any new policies for this year's election?"

Mayor Yang said: "This year's village Party organization election is not just the business of the Party members. We're implementing a system of two nominations and one election. Candidates are nominated by both Party members and the public. The entire village can participate."
Man in Gray Clothes said: "What if some people are away all year, working or doing business and can't come back, how can they be recommended then?"
Mayor Yang said: "Public recommendation cannot be delegated""We will try our best to inform them""Those who can come back should come back""Those who can't""will have to forgo this right"
Old Secretary said: "Alright Mayor Yang, let's sit inside."
Old Secretary said: "Alright, alright, let's go"
Seated Woman said: "From what you're saying, my Xian Gen isn't a Party member, so he has no chance of becoming the village Party Secretary?"
Woman in Black Clothes said: "Your Xian Gen, even if he were a Party member, he still wouldn't stand a chance."
The woman asked: "Why?"

Woman in Black Clothes said: "I'm not joking, hey, look here, the problem with your illegal house construction last year for the wedding, that's no small matter, so even if your Xian Gen were elected, he would be removed from office."
Seated Woman said: "Is it that serious?"

Woman in Black Clothes said: "Of course, anyone who was released from prison less than five years ago, violated family planning policies, or didn't fulfill their duties for a long time, is disqualified."

Woman in White Clothes said: "Hey, if you count it this way, there aren't many qualified people in our village. My Fang Sheng is one. But on the other hand, our nursery business has been growing, he doesn't even have time to catch a breath. Even if he were elected, he wouldn't care."
The woman said: "Oh, you're boasting"
The scene shifts to a small stream in the mountains, where a woman is washing clothes. A girl runs by, shouting: "Xiao Bao, hurry up"
The man said: "Alright, got it"
The man asked: "Is it heavy?"
The man replied: "Not heavy"
The man says: "If it's not heavy, then move faster"
The man in red clothes shouted: "I'm catching up"

movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.text: The car drove on the mountain road, surrounded by greenery, with the sound of cicadas echoing.
The scene shifts to a small town by the lake. A car slowly drives onto the shore, stops, and a man in sunglasses gets out.
The scene shifts to a car driving on a mountain road, heading to Camellia Village, with the title of the movie 'Election at Camellia Village' gradually appearing in the middle.

The scene shifts, and the crowd is welcoming a luxury car. They open the car door, and a man in a suit steps out. The crowd says: "Big brother, watch your step, big brother, you seem very energetic, let's go, let's go."
The scene shifts to a group of women playing cards in the yard. One woman asks, "Who is this rich man?"
The woman said, 'Oh, that’s our village chief Zhang Dong. You don’t recognize him?'
The woman said, 'She's only been married a few months. The Village Chief spends most of his time in Jiangxi. Of course, she wouldn't recognize him.'

The woman said: "If you talk about our village, his family has the most brothers. I remember when they were little, all five of them would gang up in a fight. Everyone was afraid of them. They are very influential now."
The woman continued: "The oldest Zhang Dong is the village chief" "He doesn’t manage the village affairs" "Spend most of his time in Jiangxi doing nursery business"
The woman said: "The second brother, Zhang Xi, is a contractor. Remember the road repair we had in our village? It was contracted to him."
The woman said: "The third brother, Zhang Nan, is the security director of the village. He owes so much money to the small store that he could write a book about it."
The woman continued: 'The fourth brother, Zhang Bei, is the factory director of the flour mill. The fifth brother, Zhang Zhong, is a big local ruffian in the village.'
The woman sitting on the right said: 'East, West, South, North, Central,' 'Isn't this a full mahjong hand?'
The woman said: "Let me tell you, do you know why he came back from Jiangxi at this time?"
The three women asked in unison: "Why?"
The woman said: "For Secretary selection."
The woman said, "Oh, that makes sense."

The next day, the sun was shining, and the weather was clear. The villagers were busy on the streets. A group of people in the village was walking two by two, and the man in the leather jacket at the front was Zhang Dong.
The scene shifts to a restaurant. A man said, "Come come come." "Zhang Dong, big brother, you must be tired from this trip."
The man in the suit asked: "Anything happened in the village during the half-year I was away?"
The man in the floral shirt said: "Brother, these are the materials prepared by the brothers. Come, have a look. Sit down."
The man said: 'Brother, our cousin Zhang Baoliang has now surpassed the Sapium Wood King Zhang Baotang and has become the new richest man in our village.'

Zhang Dong said: "The assistant village chief Liu Mengting has organized some kind of environmental volunteer team. It seems that she has some big opinions about the water quality of the Da Xi River outside our village."
Zhang Dong said, 'Just a bunch of kids messing around.'
The man in the floral shirt said, 'Big brother.'

movie101_7235213933035192887_780_960.text: Zhang Xiaobao said: 'Liu Mengting, this place has a beautiful view, how about I take a photo for you?'
Zhang Xiaobao: 'Good,' 'Sit here,' 'Sit, sit well,' 'One, two, three,' 'Hmm, looks good.'
Zhang Xiaobao asked: 'Liu Mengting, didn’t you just go into town a couple of days ago? Why are you heading to the city again?'

Liu Mengting said: 'Old Lady He is almost out of medicine, Uncle Lin needs to get a senior's card, his daughter needs to apply for a birth permit, and then there's Old Lady Song, who wants me to bring a jar of pickles to her son in the city. Ah, I'm too busy to keep up.'
Zhang Xiaobao said: "Village assistant, I think you're just a runner and jack of all trades."
Liu Mengting said: 'Nonsense,' 'What I do is all about serving our villagers,' 'Unlike you,' 'All talk no action.'
Zhang Xiaobao said: 'How have I been all talk no action?'
Liu Mengting: 'You’ve been talking about organizing a beautiful countryside photography exhibition for a while now, but there's been no movement on it yet.'
Zhang Xiaobao: 'Who says? The photos are all ready, look.' 'Not bad, right?' 'Now, my dad is helping me find a venue, as soon as the venue is secured, the exhibition will start.'
Liu Mengting: "Your dad, your dad, your dad, always bringing up your dad, when will you manage to do something on your own?"

Liu Mengting, who was originally walking in front, suddenly stopped and stood still on a rock. Zhang Xiaobao, who was following behind, had to stop as well. Liu Mengting looked at the rushing river ahead, hesitated for a moment, and then decisively turned around and ran back the way they came.
Zhang Xiaobao asked: 'Liu Mengting, you’re always so busy, do you have any plans for the future?'

Liu Mengting: 'My plan is to manage our village's water environment well, make our village a national ecological demonstration village, and then, protect our village's ancient buildings, and also, to develop our village's cultural tourism resources heavily, then let people from all over the country come visit our village.'
Zhang Xiaobao asked: 'And then?'
Liu Mengting continued: 'And then, if I get the chance, I would like to go back to school to continue studying my major.'
Zhang Xiaobao said: 'Still studying, huh? You’ll be an old maid by the time you're done, then how will you marry me?'
Liu Mengting said: "Stop it."

Zhang Xiaobao said: "Hey, Liu Mengting, actually I have my plans too. You know, my dad just bought me a car recently, right? He said he's going to buy me a house too." " Seeing as we’re both not so young anymore, shouldn’t we..."
Zhang Xiaobao said: 'Hey, why are you walking so slow? Old Lady He is waiting for us at home, let's move faster.'
The next morning, Liu Mengting was busy in the kitchen, pouring the cooked rice into a bowl.

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: Liu Mengting brought the medicine to Auntie He's bedside and said: 'Auntie He, this is the newly bought medicine. It's more effective than the last one. You need to take it once a day. Don't forget.'
Auntie He said: "Okay, I got it!"
Zhang Xiaobao was taking photos of Auntie He, and Chun Hu walked in. Zhang Xiaobao said: 'Hey, Chun Hu bro, what a coincidence, you're here too.'
Zhang Xiaobao said: 'Yes, Auntie He hasn't been well, so I brought a turtle I raised myself to help Auntie He regain strength.'
Chun Hu: 'Alright.'
Liu Mengting: 'Chun Hu bro, please have a seat!'
Liu Mengting said: 'Alright, alright, Auntie He.'
Auntie He said: 'Hey.'
Chun Hu said: 'Look, this turtle is so fresh! Auntie He, are you feeling any better?'
Auntie He said: 'Much better!'
Chun Hu said: 'That's good to hear, it's great that you're recovering!'

Auntie He said: 'Thank you, Chun Hu, you're such a good person. You never forget us old folks, even during holidays you give us red envelopes. Over the past few years, I can't even count how many turtles I've received from you.'

The scene shifts to the village committee, where the announcement for the election of the Camellia Village Party Organization is posted. The announcement reads: 'According to the requirements of the higher-level party organization, our village will elect the next committee members of the Party Organization.'
Bao Liang, holding a pig’s ear, said: 'Bao Liang ah.'
Director said: 'Hey, hey, hey.'
Bao Liang said: 'You didn't need to bring a gift when you came. Why are you being so polite?'
Bao Liang said: 'Director, this is the pig face we cured ourselves at home. You can't find this kind of stuff in Jiangxi.'
Bao Liang said: 'Old Five.'
Bao Liang said: 'Oh.'
Director said: 'Take it to the kitchen and prepare it well. Let's have it for lunch.'
Director said: 'Okay.'
Director said: 'Prepare a good bottle of wine, so I can have a drink with Bao Liang.'
Director said: 'Alright alright alright.'
Director said: 'Ah, Bao Liang.'
Director said: 'Hey.'
Director asked: 'How's business in the first half of the year?'
Bao Liang said: 'Not too great, business is tough these days.'
Director said: 'You're being humble, aren't you? You've always been the richest person in our village.'
Bao Liang said: 'Oh, richest in the village? I'm barely scraping by. For instance, I wanted to expand my pig farm.'
Director said: 'That's a good thing!'

Bao Liang said: 'But dealing with the land isn't easy. The two households living there refuse to move no matter what, causing a big fuss. Today, I'm hoping you, Director, can put in a good word and help my cousin out.'
Director said: 'Bao Liang ah'
Director said: 'Oh.'
Director said: 'This timing isn't right.'
Director said: 'Ah.'
Director said: 'We're in the middle of the village organization election, and since you're my cousin, if I speak up for you...'
Director said: 'Those with ulterior motives will accuse me of favoritism.'
Bao Liang said: 'In our village, with the surname Zhang, going back three generations, aren't we all relatives? Are you really afraid of that?'
Bao Liang asked: 'Do you have some sort of leverage that they're holding against you?'
Bao Liang said: 'Leverage? How could that be? My pig farm has all the proper paperwork.'
